description.spanish: Derrota a Asmonell, el Invasor Dimensional.
description.schinese: 消灭次元入侵者阿斯莫奈
description.tchinese: 擊敗次元入侵者艾斯魔涅
description.japanese: 次元の侵略者アスモネルを退治
description.brazilian: Derrote Asmonelle, o Invasor Dimensional.

description.english: Meet the Dragon of Order Ninth Name
description.koreana: 질서의 용 아홉 번째 이름 조우
description.spanish: Conoce a Noveno Nombre, el Dragón del Orden.
description.schinese: 与秩序之龙第九个名字相遇
description.tchinese: 遇見秩序之龍第九名號
description.japanese: 秩序のドラゴン、9番目の名との遭遇
description.brazilian: Encontre Nono Nome, o Dragão da Ordem.

displayName.spanish: El oscuro corazón del dragón caído
displayName.japanese: 堕落した黒のドラゴンの心臓

description.spanish: Consigue el corazón de Kassertof.
description.japanese: カスハトップの心臓を獲得
description.brazilian: Obtenha o Coração de Kassertof.

description.spanish: Derrota a Asmonell en 40 semanas o menos.
description.tchinese: 在第40週內成功擊敗艾斯魔涅
description.japanese: 40週内にアスモネルの退治に成功
description.brazilian: Derrote Asmonelle dentro da semana 40 ou menos.

description.english: Clear the game without any heroes dying
description.koreana: 영웅의 사망 없이 게임 클리어 성공
description.spanish: Completa el juego sin tener héroes derrotados.
description.schinese: 没有英雄的死亡的情况下通关游戏
description.tchinese: 成功通過遊戲而沒有英雄死亡
description.japanese: 英雄を死亡させずにゲームクリアに成功
description.brazilian: Complete o jogo sem nenhum herói morrer.

description.english: Win a battle with 3 heroes near death
description.german: Mit 3 Helden im Kritischen Zustand gewinnen
description.spanish: Gana una batalla con 3 héroes en estado crítico.
description.schinese: 3名英雄在濒死状态时获得胜利
description.tchinese: 在3名處於瀕死狀態的情況下於戰鬥中獲勝
description.japanese: 3名が瀕死状態で戦闘勝利
description.brazilian: Vença uma batalha com 3 heróis em estado crítico.

description.english: Complete expedition with only one hero surviving
description.german: Expedition mit nur einem überlebenden Helden abschließen
description.spanish: Completa una expedición con tan solo 1 héroe.
description.schinese: 仅剩1名英雄时完成远征
description.tchinese: 成功遠征且只有一名英雄生存
description.japanese: 1名の英雄のみ生存して遠征を成功
description.brazilian: Complete uma expedição com apenas um herói vivo.

description.spanish: Consigue todos los logros públicos.
description.tchinese: 達成所有公開挑戰任務
description.japanese: すべての公開挑戦課題を達成
description.brazilian: Obtenha todas as conquistas abertas.

description.german: Alle Expeditionen im Vergessenen Land abschließen
description.spanish: Completa todas las expediciones de la Tierra Olvidada.
description.schinese: 完成遗忘之地所有远征
description.tchinese: 完成所有遺忘之地遠征
description.japanese: 忘れられた地のすべての遠征を完了
description.brazilian: Complete todas as expedições da Terra Esquecida.

displayName.spanish: El camino de la Purificación II
